mdRecord.dcterms:title: Spangler's Mill
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A framed color photograph of Spangler's Mill taken on 12.31.1984. The Mill was operated by Thurman Hall from 10.28.1924 until 07.26.1930. Written on the back... "Given to Mom by daughter, Ruth Hall Higgins Mothers Day 1985" The Mill was destroyed by a storm on 02.28.2005. The original machinery is now in Meridan, Kansas in a re-erected mill.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mills and mill-work
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
